title: 110_hr5372
content: Recycling Investment Saves Energy or the RISE Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a first-year tax deduction of 50 of the adjusted basis of qualified reuse and recycling property. Defines qualified reuse and recycling property as property placed in service after December 31, 2006, which has a useful life of at least five years and which is used exclusively to collect, distribute, or recycle certain scrap materials.
